payment_terms.expectation: Repayment schedule, prepayment, and late-payment consequences are explicit.

event_of_default.expectation: Default and cure/acceleration rights are documented.

financial_covenants.expectation: Ongoing financial covenant package is measurable and enforceable.

collateral_security.expectation: Security interests and collateral maintenance requirements are explicit.

representations_and_warranties.expectation: Borrower representations are current, complete, and survival terms are clear.

governing_law.expectation: Governing law and venue are specified.

guarantees.expectation: Guarantee scope, guarantor obligations, and release mechanics are explicit.

policy_rules.description: Loan agreements must include enforceable repayment obligations.
Loan agreements must define default remedies and notice mechanics.
